title: LvL Up 270 Blue Essence reward..
body:
Hey I got to** lvl 6** just right now and **got Xin Zhao** out of** the LvL up capsule** and he is only **worth 270 Blue Essence.**

I checked Riot post and they said 
> "A Leveling Capsule contains champ shards with a BE value of either 720, 900, 960, or 1,240. (The average value is 910 based on drop rates)" 

I was wondering why I got one with a value of 270 Blue Essence. 

**Riot help, please. 

**

replies.body: You're only level 6 maybe? I'm lvl 42, and it's all been working fine for me.

It's not because of lvl, would be stupid if it has something to do with the lvl. 

Riot themselves  stated that u got at least 720

The post you were probably talking about was for post 30 levels. Cactopus also had a post with a chart showing the rewards for levels 1-30 [**over here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/hAaYMrEs-leveling-and-rewards-early-impressions-and-adjustments).

https://i.imgur.com/SWsjH5M.png
good that the average is 700-900 but I got 270.
